The term fue hair transplant stands for follicular unit hair transplant. Fue hair transplants produce the most natural hair transplant results. A fue hair transplant is the latest hair restoration procedure that preserves the donor hair, produces more natural results and has a faster recovery time. It’s the only hair transplant procedure that enables natural hair growth. Fue hair transplant surgery is safe, minimally invasive and cost efficient.

With this new medical breakthrough hair transplant procedure you no longer have to live with hair loss or a receding hairline. Todayâ€™s fue hair transplant procedures combines surgery and artistic skills to give you natural looking hairlines.

If you donâ€™t meet with a couple of surgeons and ask the right questions, it might cost you thousands of dollars and might potentially cause permanent damage to your hair.

Hereâ€™s how the fue hair transplant or follicular unit hair transplant procedure works. Using state of the art equipment, an experienced hair transplant surgeon isolates follicular units with one to four hairs from the donor strip one at a time. These follicular units are carefully transplanted into the balding area with precise angles and density for maximum results. This medical breakthrough hair restoration procedure results in naturally growing thicker and fuller hair.

When you see a hair transplant surgeon for your evaluation, the doctor will evaluate your current hair loss situation and take photos.

Every person has a different size head and pattern of hair loss. Therefore a hair transplant surgeon will usually take photos and measurements of the hair loss areas to determine how many grafts you will need to get the results you want.

The surgeon will take into account your age, hair loss pattern, skin tone, hair type, and density. He will discuss your hair loss history and family hair loss history and determine your hair restoration goals.

When using the right doctor and the advanced and innovative hair transplant techniques available today such as the fue hair transplant, natural hair restoration results are possible for all patients regardless of their age or degree of hair loss. When getting a well-performed hair transplant, you hair should look natural. In fact, it will look so natural that it may be difficult for anyone to detect you had hair transplant surgery.

Today, you no longer have to live with hair loss. Hair transplants can help men and women permanently restore their natural, growing hair. A full head of hair make a difference in how you feel about yourself. Don’t allow hair loss to affect your life style. Regain your confidence and look younger.
